project.title: Canvas
project.description: Canvas is a never-ending, interactive painting. Alter the direction of the brushes to influence the painting or sit back and watch. Every thirty seconds the canvas is cleared and a new set of design principles are created. Learn to let go and design with the flow.
project.description_short: Canvas is a never-ending, interactive painting. Alter the direction of the brushes to influence the painting. Every thirty seconds the canvas is cleared and a new set of design principles are created. Learn to let go and design with the flow.
